Mayor and City Council

Regular Meetings

  • Workshop starts at 6:00 p.m. and the meeting starts at 6:30 p.m. 
  • The first and third Tuesday of every month (Only on the first Tuesday during July and December).

Agendas & Minutes

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.
View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes

Home Rule Charter

First incorporated in 1955 as a General Law City, Robinson adopted a charter in 1999 and is now a Home Rule City operating with the Council-Manager form of government. The seven-member elected City Council sets policy and appoints a City Manager who is responsible for the day to day operations.

City of Robinson Home Rule Charter: 

  • Amended City of Robinson Charter - Adopted by Ordinance 2021-014 June 1, 2021
  • City of Robinson Home Rule Charter (Original Document, Scanned) (PDF)
